name: Clinical Global Impression Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire CGI Original Version Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Clinical Global Impression Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Clinical Global Impression Guy - Rate this item on the basis of drug effect only. Select the terms which best describe the degrees of therapeutic effect and side effects.

Clinical Global Impression Guy - Rate total improvement whether or not, in your judgement, it is due entirely to drug treatment. Compared to his condition at admission to the project, how much has he changed?
Clinical Global Impression Guy - Considering your total clinical experience with this particular population, how mentally ill is the patient at this time?
terms.preferredTerm: CGI Original Version - Severity of Illness
